page.title: 04LOCAL HISTORY CHANGING TIMES
page.content: A lot of young people take no interest in the older members of society,and find them boring and over talkative of times gone by.Favourite lessons seem to follow a pattern of art, craft and PE and punishment in school includes detention,which is gained by being rude,talking and fighting. For old people in times of war,evenings were spent darning clothes to be used again,it was a fact that new clothes were difficult to obtain,and some women knitted comforts for the forces or listened to the radio .Nobody could remember being bored.There are mixed opinions of today's young people,some are good,some are bad.Most people are agreed on blaming a home-life of insecurity for the problems like football,hooliganism.All in all,times have changed a lot over the last fifty years.......
